prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Sleeveless T-Shirt "Sunset Boy" in Sunset Orange, 100% organic cotton.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for garment placement. IMPORTANT: Maintain realistic sleeveless t-shirt proportions - the width-to-height ratio should match a natural sleeveless/tank top silhouette. Do NOT stretch or elongate the garment vertically.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- SLEEVELESS: This is a sleeveless t-shirt/tank top with clean-finished armholes (designed sleeveless, not cut-off). Wide armholes clearly visible on both sides.
- NO EYELETS on this garment
- COLLAR: Round neckline, ribbed or bound with clean finish.
- PRINT/GRAPHIC: "Sunset Boy" print visible on the front chest area.
- Ron Dorff label visible at the inside neckline.

STYLING: T-shirt laid perfectly flat with relaxed, natural proportions. Sleeveless armholes clearly visible on both sides. Smooth 100% organic cotton texture visible throughout.

COLOR: CRITICAL - Copy the EXACT gradient from the input image. This t-shirt has an OMBRE/DIP-DYE effect: lighter pink-toned orange at the TOP, fading to deeper vibrant orange at the BOTTOM. Match this gradient EXACTLY as shown in the input. Do NOT make it solid orange - preserve the gradient transition.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT, CLEAN, EVEN studio lighting. No harsh shadows. Do NOT overexpose or wash out the vibrant orange color.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. The sleeveless t-shirt should look naturally proportioned and relaxed.
prompts.print:
Cropped detail shot matching composition from reference photo (last image).

GARMENT: Sleeveless t-shirt from image 1 - copy the EXACT print "SUNSET BOY" and ombre gradient.
ANGLE: Slight 30-degree angle looking down - NOT flat overhead.
FRAMING: Collar at top, print on chest, crop at mid-torso. NOT full garment.
FABRIC: Smooth and flat - NO wrinkles, NO folds, NO bunching.
BACKGROUND: LIGHT warm gray - bright and clean.
